channel.title: 667/728 DragonX | Dicing | Flower Game | Custom Minigames | Grand Exchange
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/2rm6p8x.png[/img]
We are an older RSPS that has just emerged from it's sleep. Journey along with us to restore our glory. We have professional developers, a beautiful website, friendly staff, and fresh content.
We Bring 317 Into A Better Quality! We Have And Create Awesome Features To Bring 317 Features Into A Better Quality. We Mix 667, and 317 Features Together And Create an Amazing Server!
Website: [url=http://dragonxrsps.tk]DragonX :: Portal[/url] Webclient: [url=http://dragonx.herobo.com/webclient.html]Webclient[/url] Client Download: [url=https://dl.dropbox.com/s/mjxcwshoqmekpbm/client.jar?dl=1]Client Jar Download[/url][/center]
What Do We Have?:
[ul]Grand Exchange PolyPore Staff/Dungeon 100% Mage Book 100% Weed Smoking 100% Awesome Random Events (Tons More Being Added) Perfect Economy Perfected Skills Awesome Skilling Zone Awesome Skilling Locations Great Money Making Fun Staff Active and Nice Owner Prestiging With Rewards and Ranks XP Locking/Unlocking 100% Bork 100% Nomad 100% Nex 100% GWD's 100% Bosses Flawless Pk Point System Pk Point Shop Shopping Area Beast Dungeons Daily Updates Active Coders Loyalty Emotes/System Not A Matrix Leech Prefected Slayer and Tasks Awesome Summoning Custom and Beast Dungeoneering Custom Armour Custom Game Content Perfect Exp Rates 100% Glacors Drop Party at 50 Players MrEx Gives Hats For Pk Kills Perfected Pk Areas Beautiful Website Key and Chest System 100% Bones on Altar 100% Growing Community Perfect Switching QBD KBD Full Jadinko Full Barrows Warriors Guild Custom Hararken Boss Steadfast, Ragefire, Glavien Boots Addicting And Super Fun Perfect and Fixed Trade
[CENTER]WARNING: This Server Is Super Addicting, People Never Leave ;)
Media:

[IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/8wctgi.png[/img]

[IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/291ylnt.png[/img][/center]
UPDATE: New Home!
I was lazy to get some media but it was part of da rules so I guess I just got some random ones. This server is not a Matrix Leech. We are an awesome custom server with beast stuff! Join now to experience something new![/ul]
